meanings.definition: A symbol in the form of an equal-armed cross with each arm continued at a right angle, used as the emblem of the Nazi party and as an ancient religious symbol.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a large swasticas on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The ancient artifact had intricate swasticas engraved on it.
meanings.sent3: During the play, the character accidentally tripped over a swasticas prop.
meanings.sent4: Her necklace sparkled like a golden swasticas under the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained the meaning of the swasticas to the curious students.

meanings.definition: A swastika-shaped figure used as a symbol or ornament in various cultures.
meanings.sent1: The artist created a beautiful swasticas out of clay.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, people wear jewelry with swasticas designs.
meanings.sent3: The cake topper featured a tiny swasticas made of icing.
meanings.sent4: The windmill's blades formed a rotating swasticas in the sky.
meanings.sent5: Children in the art class drew colorful swasticas on paper.
